scripts.build: browserify -t browserify-css components/form-creator.js --standalone FormCreator > dist/prot-form-gen.js && cp public/* dist && cp components/* dist/src
scripts.build-min: browserify -g [ uglifyify -x .js ] -t browserify-css components/form-creator.js --standalone FormCreator > dist/prot-form-gen.min.js && cp public/* dist && cp components/* dist/src
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-min
scripts.deploy-all: npm run git-push && npm run deploy && ssh protronic@prot-subuntu "cd /media/daten/theia/project/java/json-mirror && docker stop json-mirror && sudo ./mvnw package -Pnative -Dquarkus.native.container-build=true -Dquarkus.container-image.build=true && docker rm json-mirror && docker run -p 8087:8080 -d --restart always --name json-mirror root/json-mirror:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT"
scripts.babel-build: browserify -t browserify-css components/es5-polyfill.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] --standalone FormCreator > bundle_es5.js
scripts.babel-build-min: browserify -t browserify-css components/es5-polyfill.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -g [ uglifyify -x .js ] --standalone FormCreator > bundle_es5.min.js
